original_text: Give to the Lord as much as you are able to. Your gifts may be large or small, as much as the Lord has blessed you. Judges Give to the Lord as much as you are able to. Your gifts may be large or small, as much as the Lord has blessed you.
korean_text: 각 사람이 네 하나님 여호와께서 주신 복을 따라 그 힘대로 드릴지니라

sentences.original_text: Give to the Lord as much as you are able to.
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께 할 수 있는 만큼 드리세요.

sentences.original_text: Your gifts may be large or small,
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 선물은 크거나 작을 수 있습니다,

sentences.original_text: as much as the Lord has blessed you.
